channel.name: HL7 - Illegal embedded chars
channel.description:
The & character is a delimiter character in HL7 which should be escaped.
Unfortunately some implementations are incorrect in that they do not escape user entered content that contain these characters.
This example shows how one can preprocess HL7 messages to solve this problem.
For discussion see:
http://help.interfaceware.com/forums/topic/how-to-handle-special-characters-in-message-field
